paper_abstract: This paper proposed a fault monitoring policy for hierarchical network with multi-manager. It can be used to monitor the network in real time and lightened the burden of the network monitoring management. With the application of the multi-agent Markov Decision Processes in the network management, an appropriate policy model of SNMP polling with the reinforcement learning is given. The simulations results show that the reinforcement-learning model can provide effective fault localization meanwhile decrease the overhead of network management remarkably.
paper_title: Analyzing fault monitoring policy for hierarchical network with MMDP environment
